title: Assign roles and decision authority to contacts
description: As a sales representative, I want to assign roles and decision-making authority levels to contacts, so that I can identify key stakeholders and decision makers in the sales process.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am viewing or editing a contact, when I access the role section, then I can select from predefined roles (Decision Maker, Influencer, User, Blocker)
Given I assign a role to a contact, when I save, then the role is displayed on the contact card and profile
Given I am viewing a company profile, when I look at associated contacts, then I can see each contact's role
Given I filter contacts, when I select a role filter, then only contacts with that role are displayed

definitionOfDone.item: Role data model and schema updated
